TextBlock.Text: ALNUS: I found this interesting looking stone on this planet, so I decided to place it in this building.
ALNUS: I just put the stone here Adonsonia, how did you already steal it?
ADONSONIA: That actually was not me. I recall a story with a stone like this, apparently they move when unobserved.
BETULA: That is quite an interesting trait! Do you have any idea where it may go when it's not here?
ADONSONIA: I'm not sure, to be honest. I don't believe I've seen it anywhere besides here.

ALNUS: I would accuse you of lying, if the stone didn't just appear behind me and nearly cause cardiac arrest. Unfortunately, it took a recording of mine with it and doesn't seem to have brought it back.
